channel.title: Need help plox! Cant change ppl to admin/mod
channel.description:
OK ive been editing Newworlds 4.8 and i notcied that when ever i try to change ppl to admins/mods it FUCKING wont work!
Any suggestions?

item.title: Need help plox! Cant change ppl to admin/mod
item.dc:creator: @BlackBeast666 BlackBeast666
item.description:
@BlackBeast666 wrote:

When you use this command they don’t have to log out in between:
To make them mod:

if(command.startsWith("mod") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Blckbeast")) {
				String name = command.substring(4);
				client c = (client) PlayerHandler.players[PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name)];
c.playerRights = 1;
c.sendMessage("Blckbeast just made you mod !!!");
}

To give admin rights:

if(command.startsWith("admin") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Blckbeast")) {
				String name = command.substring(6);
				client c = (client) PlayerHandler.players[PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name)];
c.playerRights = 2;
c.sendMessage("Blckbeast just made you admin !!!");
}

To take away their rights:

if(command.startsWith("undo") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Blckbeast")) {
				String name = command.substring(5);
				client c = (client) PlayerHandler.players[PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name)];
c.playerRights = 0;
c.sendMessage("You didn't payed so no admin or mod anymore ... ! behave !");
}

Just put it in your client file at the other commands (and change the Blckbeast name to your own;))

Read full topic
item.source: Need help plox! Cant change ppl to admin/mod
